A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What... was this movie about?  What were the themes?  What was the character progression?  Why is the most beloved Star Wars character of all time turned into a coward?  Why is he afraid of this emo kid?  Who thought that completely destroying all of our favorite characters and attempting the replace them with vapid and undeveloped paper dolls?  It looked pretty.  I thought the sound was great.  This is the first piece of Star Wars I will not spend another dime on.  Do you hear me Disney?  This is not how you get my money.
